DOC.brief_summary: Rationale : Sleepiness behind wheel cause many traffic accident . It claim 15-minute break consume energy drink Red Bull® Energy Drink counteract driver sleepiness . Objective : The objective study compare drive simulator performance ( 1 ) 15-minute break placebo , ( 2 ) 15-minute break Red Bull® Energy Drink , ( 3 ) continue drive . Study design : A double-blind , placebo-controlled crossover study . Study population : Healthy human volunteer , 21-35 year old . Intervention : Each subject perform 3 test day : 1 . 4 hour continue drive 2 . 2 hour drive , 15-minute break + Red Bull® Energy Drink , follow 2 hour drive 3 . 2 hour drive , 15-minute break + placebo , follow 2 hour drive Main study parameters/endpoints : Standard Deviation Lateral Position ( SDLP ) , i.e . weave car .
